MS.S: Cross-platform Console Gui Tools for PowerShell

# Release Notes_x000D__x000A_## v0.7.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Upgraded to PowerShell 7.2 and .NET target framework `net60`_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updated Terminal.Gui to 1.7_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Fixed #131 - Strip ANSI_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.6.3_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Unreleased!_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.6.2_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Update Terminal.Gui to 1.0._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Disable mouse mode to fix bug with mouse movement being printed to console._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Gracefully fail when running in remote sessions._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.6.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Fix off-by-one error with ellipsis so columns should be better aligned._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.6.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Now supports `-Filter` parameter._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updated to use the final release of `Terminal.Gui` v0.90 (which is feature complete for 1.0)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.5.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_`Out-ConsoleGridView` has been totally refactored!_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_First off, no more silly F9 menu to accept!_x000D__x000A_All you have to do is hit `ENTER` to accept your selection or `ESC` to cancel._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Also, `-OutputMode` works as expected now. `Single` lets you only select one item. `Multiple` is the default._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.4.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fix filter indexing to return correct selected objects_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.4.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Regex filter_x000D__x000A_* Newlines rendering fix (Thanks @tig!)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.3.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Windows OS support (PS 6.2+)_x000D__x000A_* dynamic column widths_x000D__x000A_* Fix arrow key issue on non-Windows_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.2.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Initial Release
Cross-platform Console Gui Tools for PowerShell

# Release Notes_x000D__x000A_## v0.7.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Upgraded to PowerShell 7.2 and .NET target framework `net60`_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updated Terminal.Gui to 1.7_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Fixed #131 - Strip ANSI_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.6.3_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Unreleased!_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.6.2_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Update Terminal.Gui to 1.0._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Disable mouse mode to fix bug with mouse movement being printed to console._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Gracefully fail when running in remote sessions._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.6.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Fix off-by-one error with ellipsis so columns should be better aligned._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.6.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Now supports `-Filter` parameter._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Updated to use the final release of `Terminal.Gui` v0.90 (which is feature complete for 1.0)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.5.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_`Out-ConsoleGridView` has been totally refactored!_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_First off, no more silly F9 menu to accept!_x000D__x000A_All you have to do is hit `ENTER` to accept your selection or `ESC` to cancel._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Also, `-OutputMode` works as expected now. `Single` lets you only select one item. `Multiple` is the default._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.4.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Fix filter indexing to return correct selected objects_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.4.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Regex filter_x000D__x000A_* Newlines rendering fix (Thanks @tig!)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.3.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Windows OS support (PS 6.2+)_x000D__x000A_* dynamic column widths_x000D__x000A_* Fix arrow key issue on non-Windows_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## v0.2.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Initial Release
